conbody.p: User preference such as Subscriber Notification profile is associated with the User in NCC. NCC Allows operators to configure user preferences like the notification profile per subscriber through NCC GUI via smadmin. The Notification profile is created in NCC system to send the notifications to end subscribers. Notification could be sent based on the profile (Usage, Threshold, Offers, Account Update). Operator can configure the notification preference per subscriber. The data is stored in NCC database and logs. This information, when stored in NCC database and logs, is secured from unauthorized access by restricting access to only individuals with authorized access rights. The data is removed from the database when the subscriber opts to have no service or opts to choose a different service provider. Logs and CDRs have a configurable duration.
